00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace RPrimitive {
00029         
00030 template <typename T> 
00031     struct RPrimitive: public RDK2::Object 
00032 {
00033     T value;
00034 
00035     RPrimitive();
00036     RPrimitive(T value);
00037 
00038     virtual bool hasStringRepresentation() const { return true; }
00039     virtual std::string getStringRepresentation() const;
00040     virtual bool loadFromStringRepresentation(const std::string&);
00041     virtual bool hasStringForVisualization() const { return true; }
00042 
00043     virtual const char* myClassName() const = 0;
00044     
00045     operator       T&()       { return value; }
00046     operator const T&() const { return value; }
00047     
00048 };
